content: Hello - Bullion-n-BTC has asked that I host this sale for him. This design came from his want for Quotesomething a bit different than the ‚Äúnormal‚Äù bitcoin wallet - something ‚Äústeampunk robot wearing a bitcoin T-shirt‚Äù on obverse of coin / reverse has the LuckyFool ‚Äúcrown‚Äù & ‚Äújester‚Äù privy marks(click images to enlarge)  coin details:Artist: Gus Fink - does dark fantasy style artwork - IG: https://www.instagram.com/gusfink/ - website: gusfink.bigcartel.comTotal mintage: 100 coins - 50 to be sold here on the forumsSize and composition: 38 mm x 3 mm 1 oz copper alloyDIY wallet which comes with 2 of the custom "LuckyFool" hologramsThe serial # (# of 100) and ‚ÄúLuckyFool Bullion‚Äù is laser etched onto edge of each roundEach round will come in an airtite with foam bumperSerial numbers will be randomly given, however buyers have option to carry over/reserve future releases with same serial numberPrice:Price is 40 USD each coinPayment methods accepted: ¬†Venmo (@Jory-LeBlanc) Cashapp : $JoryLeBlancBtc: 1CmgifjMiQmsnd4bZYAyAGVWzBEXkarTzVPayments are made directly to Bullion-n-BTC - once he confirms receipt and notifies me, I will be in touch for the shipping as Bullion-n-BTC has shipped all coins to me. Shipping will be handled separately from the sale because of this. I can ship direct or hand off to minerjones for consolidation and reshipping.

comments.body: Bullion-n-BTCI received the 2 wallets I bought recently. These coins are great. It is kind of hard to see the image on the obverse in photos, but much easier to see now that I have them in hand. The color and texture of the coin is unique and very cool. Great job. These are awesome and very affordable. Great jobSteeley
